title.en: Hajime Kara Suki Nanyaro? Kiryu Kairi Niwa Revenge ga Kakanai!

altTitles.ja: 初めから好きなんやろ？ 桐生海里にはリベンジが効かない！

altTitles.en: What Do You Mean You Liked Me From The Start? The Revenge Against Kiryu Kairi Has No Effect!
Weren't You Into Me All Along? It Ain't Easy Taking Revenge on Kairi Kiryu!

description.en:
His long finger stimulates my sensitive place. At the same time, his hot tongue licks there repeatedly and makes it feel numb and I feel more and more strange… Kiryu Kairi, whom I had a traumatic romantic experience with, transferred to my cosmetics company where the male to female ratio is 9:1. With his looks and personality, he instantly became popular among the female staff… Huh? Did he forget that we were classmates? But I will not be fooled like when I was in high school! So I decided to get revenge on him, but instead, he pinned me down and said “naughty girls have to be punished”?!

Even though I don’t want to feel good because of him, I’m dripping wet and my insides throb for him. It feels so good that I am scared… “If I touch you like this, I wonder what will happen?” Am I going to be devoured?
